reviewText: Knowing Clyde Ware and having worked on plays of his, I was happy to see his one act play turned into a film starring his wife, Davey Davison.  An unusual film, around a recluse family in rural West Virginia, the homeplace of Mr. Ware, it has an interesting story line and nice work from all of the cast.
Please release the early Martin Sheen classic on DVD in the not so distant future! Thanks!
